short_summary: This contract is for the hosting of infrastructure for a radio frequency spectrum auction, specifically for the 3800 MHz band andconsulting services.
description: Infrastructure hosting for the 3800 MHz spectrum auction is a requirement for the successful provision and implementation of the auction software.,overflow_mapping_init(selector, args);check_mutation_selectors(window,document.selectordata)Servers will be hosted in a Canadian data centre and will be managed by the contractor. Additionally, they can provide to upload configuration files to the server(s) for future use. This is a month-to-month contract.
tags: Professional Special Services, EDP, Not Elsewhere Specified
